A1.name: Brave Hearth
A1.story: Once upon a time, there was a king. A dragon came and hurt people and burned houses. The king wanted to stop the dragon. He looked for help, but no one could. One day, a young knight came and said he could stop the dragon. He wanted to marry the king's daughter. The king said yes, and the knight went to fight the dragon. The knight won and saved the kingdom. The king kept his promise and the knight married the princess. They all lived happily ever after.

A1.name: Chicken Hearth
A1.story: Once upon a time, there was a silly chicken who wanted to fly like a bird. One day, she climbed to the top of a tall tree and jumped off, flapping her arms wildly. But instead of flying, she fell down with a thump. The next day, she tried again and fell down again. This happened for many days, until one day, a wise old owl saw her trying to fly. He laughed and asked her, -Why don't you just be a chicken and enjoy walking and pecking at the ground instead of trying to fly? The silly chicken thought about it and realized the owl was right. From then on, she was happy being a chicken and didn't try to fly anymore. And she lived happily ever after, pecking at the ground and enjoying her life as a chicken.
